task.title: Decision-making process
task.shortdesc: The TMS market is often confusing and still evolving. That's why the decision to buy a new system or change an existing one is not easy.

taskbody.prereq: You have decided to purchase a TMS, but are still wondering how to start the whole process. First, you need to outline your needs and goals to be achieved.
taskbody.context: To choose the right TMS for your company, you should consider a lot of different aspects, both from business and technical perspectives. To make it easier for you, I strongly encourage you to follow these steps:

postreq.note: The whole process can take even a few months so be prepared to allocate a specific period of time. Don't hurry up - the decision is important and costly! I also recommend to set yourself a go-live date early and try to stick to it.
